results.popUpText: Your poor family do not have much books to read, but you borrow from the library.

choices.choice_text: Ask for a telescope from your parents

results.popUpText: Even though they like you, their financial situation is not good enough. It makes you upset.

choices.choice_text: Join to the college space club

results.popUpText: Gathering with your club mates and talking about the vastness of space is your favorite activity.

choices.choice_text: Work part time to support your family

results.popUpText: It puts a strain on your health, but your family is very thankful to you.
Working as a post-graduate academics, you developed your knowledge on cosmic matters. Now you plan to enter to Space Agency exams. Be careful! You will have only 2 chances to win it.
You won the exams! You can now access the Space Agency programs. One more step towards your goal of becoming an astronaut.
It was a very tough exam and you failed. You have 1 more try. Develop your intelligence and try again.
You won the exams! You can now access the Space Agency programs. One more step towards your goal of becoming an astronaut.
You failed again! It was a devastating blow on your dreams. You question what can you do in the rest of your life...
You need to develop your physique before being able to join to a space crew.
It was a fantastic year as you become an astronaut and paid a visit to the International Space Station!

choices.choice_text: Enroll at hyper speed spaceships programme

results.popUpText: You are now a part of the first Mars voyagers. Soon you will go to Mars!
It was an exhausting voyage, but with the new technology you went to Mars and returned in just several months. Setting foot on those red sands was a fantastic feeling!
You found some clues on aliens taken captive on Earth.
People did not want to talk about it, but a young scientist told you about the rumours of imprisoned aliens in Area 51.
You managed to get a temporary position in Area 51 as a lab researcher. But they do not allow you to get into the alien chambers.
You managed to crawl through the air vents and found the imprisoned aliens.
You saved those poor aliens. But then you were labeled as a traitor to the nation. You lost your job. You lost your wealth. But you firmly believe that you did the right thing.
To protect your job and reputation, you decided to forget about those aliens and keep your normal life.

choices.choice_text: Pay for your little brother's college tuition

results.popUpText: With your generous action, your family and your little brother finally found comfort and happiness. It made you feel great as well.
You need to have a strong body in order to become a proper astronaut.

choices.choice_text: Listen to radio signals to detect aliens

results.popUpText: You haven't heard anything yet. It's not an easy task, don't give up! Keep on listening.
Finally you detected an anomaly coming from 51 Pegasi b! It seems like the signal has a pattern, but you don't know how to decode it!

choices.choice_text: Team up with cryptologists to decode the signal

results.popUpText: After spending sleepless nights, the team came up with this result: "Pay your debts!" But what does the earth owe them?

choices.choice_text: Secretly send a message to the Pegasians

results.popUpText: You realised that you weren't qualified enough to write a message in their language and you need to improve yourself.

choices.choice_text: Report the Pegasian message to your superior

results.popUpText: After several days, she announced that your research was cancelled and you were no longer allowed to listen to the radio signals.

You learnt that Pegasians lent money to George Washington during the Revolutionary War, and they want their 20 dollars back. The Space Agency sent a rocket with 20 dollars and the Pegasians were finally satisfied.

choices.choice_text: Take linguistic lessons to learn Pegasian language

results.popUpText: You used your linguistic skills to decode their language and you are ready to communicate with them.

dilemmas.text: Your friends invite you to a play-date. What toys will you take with you?

choices.popUpText: Your friends loved your ponies and you had a great time.
A boy loved your cars and played with you all day.
No one liked your toys, but you still had some fun playing with your astronauts alone. You dreamt of a space adventure as they traveled to Mars and found aliens there.

dilemmas.text: A teacher asked about your favorite planet.

choices.popUpText: Your teacher told you that you will be strong like Mars.
Your teacher told you that you will be wise like Saturn.
Whole classroom was dumbfounded and did not know what to say. Then a classmate yelled, 'neeerd!' You did not care and felt proud of knowing a lot about space.

dilemmas.text: You have extra time to join a school club.

choices.popUpText: You had fun doing jumps and stretching your muscles.
You got to know some space nerds! You finally don't feel lonely.

choices.choice_text: Use your free time for fun
choices.popUpText: You later regretted the time you wasted by watching TV.

dilemmas.text: Elon Musk is holding an autograph session at your local town.

choices.choice_text: Go and wait quietly in the line
choices.popUpText: It was an extremely long line, and you could not get an autograph.

choices.choice_text: Try to cut through the line get an autograph
choices.popUpText: Musk liked your enthusiasm and gave you an autograph on your cheek.
He started crying and left the autograph session early.

dilemmas.text: Your friend invited you to her birthday party, but there is a rocket launch scheduled at the same hour.

choices.choice_text: Skip the birthday to watch the launch
choices.popUpText: The launch was a failure as the rocket exploded. You skipped the party for nothing!
You had great time with your friends. Sometimes you need to put away your love of space.

choices.choice_text: Go to the birthday, but ask your friend to open the TV for the launch
choices.popUpText: She agreed to open it, but you did not pay much attention to the launch as socializing with friends was quite fun.

dilemmas.text: A group of kids want to know more about space.

choices.choice_text: Tell them about the solar system
choices.popUpText: They found it boring and did not pay much attention.

choices.choice_text: Tell them about the black holes
choices.popUpText: They were fascinated by the mysterious black holes.

choices.choice_text: Tell them to go read some books by themselves
choices.popUpText: They protested your idea and went on to play some video games.

dilemmas.text: A scientific magazine you subscribed wrote something factually wrong about the Moon.

choices.choice_text: Send an angry e-mail, demanding an apology
choices.popUpText: The magazine representative responded in a equally angry reply and called you a 'nerd.'

choices.choice_text: Send a kind e-mail asking for a correction
choices.popUpText: They apologized and posted a statement on their website.
They keep making the same mistakes in the further issues and you had to cancel your subscription.

dilemmas.text: Your mother baked you a birthday cake in a spaceship shape. But it has caramel which is something you hate.

choices.choice_text: Try to eat it to please her
choices.popUpText: You suddenly realized that you actually like caramel. It was a great cake! And your mom was also happy.

choices.choice_text: Thank her, but don't eat from the cake
choices.popUpText: She got a little bit upset. But still she was content with your honesty.

choices.choice_text: Scold her for not knowing your preferences
choices.popUpText: She got visibly sad and went to her room. You felt terrible afterwards.

dilemmas.text: You learnt that your poor neighbor's kid is interested in space.

choices.popUpText: She thanked you a lot. It was heart-warming to see her happiness.

choices.choice_text: Go and tell her about the stars and the planets
choices.popUpText: She listened your words with utmost attention. You had to stop speaking as her mother called her back.

choices.choice_text: Tell her to find another interest
choices.popUpText: She was both disappointed and surprised. You later found out she dropped out of school. You felt a bit guilty.

dilemmas.text: You want to do something extra with your knowledge on space.

choices.choice_text: Give free lectures to young people
choices.popUpText: The neighborhood appreciated your kind gesture and donated some money for your efforts.
Your book, 'A life of Space' became a best-seller and you earned a lot of money.

choices.choice_text: Try to build a rocket in your backyard
choices.popUpText: You managed to launch the mini-rocket, but then it landed on your neighbors' roof. You had to pay for the damage.

customChanges.popUpText: While your friends play with toys, you keep stargazing and dreaming about space.
One of your class mates mocked your dreams of becoming an astronaut. You simply ignored it as you believe in yourself.
With your touching letter of intent on overcoming hardships and becoming an astronaut, the University of Starfield offered you a nice scholarship and you became a college student!
You need to educate and train yourself in all skills to become an astronaut. Try to use any opportunity to move in your career.
You need to finish college to pursue your astronomy dreams. Work hard on your studies.

results.popUpText: You ran around the house catching all kinds of imaginary criminals.

choices.choice_text: Search for some news about your father's death online

results.popUpText: You could not find anything solid, as if every lead has been covered by some hands.
You need to get stronger to be a proper police officer.
You found out that it was the 3rd cookie shop that was broken into in the last month.

choices.choice_text: Interrogate a cookie shop heist witness

results.popUpText: They told you that the robbers were men wearing cookie masks. Interesting... You need a high intelligence to solve this case.

choices.choice_text: Find the cookie mask seller online

results.popUpText: The mask seller revealed that all of the masks were bought by a man named, 'Lorenzo Cookie.'

choices.choice_text: Pay a visit to Lorenzo Cookie

results.popUpText: After you knocked on his door, he let you in. Then jumped on you with his 3 mobs. You managed to beat them off and arrested the mobs, but Lorenzo escaped. You need to be intelligent to track him down.
After you knocked on his door, they let you in. Inside there were 4 mobs and they attacked you. You barely escaped from the place and saved your life. You were not strong enough.
Using the clues perfectly, you managed to track down his secret warehouse. He got arrested with a police raid and the Cookie Gang was no more.

choices.choice_text: Spend lots of time in cookie shops

results.popUpText: One day a cookie shop was assaulted by Lorenzo and his men, and you were there to stop him. They were arrested.
One day a cookie shop was attacked, and you could not stop Lorenzo and his men. You were injured during the fight.

choices.choice_text: Interrogate Lorenzo Cookie about your dad's murder

results.popUpText: Lorenzo revealed that a mob named Al Shampone would know more about the murder. You finally have some lead!
You found out that he is a wealthy businessman and literally untouchable by the law.

choices.choice_text: Look into Al Shampone's tax records

results.popUpText: You spent countless nights investigating his tax records and finally found something to convict him.

choices.choice_text: Share Al Shampone's tax evasion with a congressman

results.popUpText: Your revelation started a big investigation on Al Shampone. And all of his crimes were unearthed. During his questioning, he told you that your father was killed by Eddie Baddie.

choices.choice_text: Confront Al Shampone in front of his house

results.popUpText: He called the police and you were taken back to the station. Your senior officer gave you a warning not to bother Al Shampone again.

choices.choice_text: Act as a vigilante and attack Al Shampone

results.popUpText: You managed to defeat his bodyguards and asked him about your dad. He told you that Eddie Baddie killed your father. He promised not to report your vigilante actions.
You tried to ambush him in front of his house, but one of his bodyguards shot you to death. You failed to take your father's revenge. You needed to be stronger.
You found out that a special agent named Smith arrested him (You can play Brain Test 2 to learn about this story). But then Eddie escaped the prison. He must be hiding somewhere.
You learnt that his 3 lackeys were arrested after the escape. You need to interrogate them all: Fat Bob, Slim Jack and Ugly Dory.

Pompous Agent Smith did not pay much attention to your plight. He offered to help only if you buy him a new jacket and new sunglasses. He will accept only the most expensive ones. You need to collect some money it seems...

choices.choice_text: Buy Agent Smith a new jacket

results.popUpText: You are wasting so much money on this guy, you hope he will be of use to you in finding Eddie Baddie.
You brought him the gifts, but he started laughing. 'I was just joking, dude! I will accept these but I will pay your money back. I was actually following Baddie's trail and I found out his hideout!'

choices.choice_text: Raid Eddie Baddie's hideout with Smith

results.popUpText: Together with Agent Smith, you managed to take down Baddie's guards one by one. Finally you captured him. After you confront him, he told, 'I killed your father because he was too handsome, I was jealous!' You couldn't believe your ears.
Your physical condition was not enough for this fight and one of Eddie Baddie's thugs fatally injured you.

choices.choice_text: Raid Eddie Baddie's hideout with the police

results.popUpText: Together with the police, you managed to take down Baddie's guards one by one. Finally you captured him. After you confront him, he told, 'I killed your father because he was too handsome, I was jealous!' You couldn't believe your ears.
Your physical condition was not enough for this fight and one of Eddie Baddie's thugs fatally injured you.
Fat Bob told you that he is hiding somewhere in Canada.
After you told him that you know he is in Canada, Jack gasped and decided not to talk. You must try Ugly Dory.
She immediately told you the exact location of Baddie's hideout as soon as she heard about your father. She seems like a too sentimental criminal.
You sneaked into Baddie's cell and killed him to take your revenge. You were expelled from the police force afterwards. But you still felt great, finally taking your father's revenge.

choices.choice_text: Leave Eddie Baddie to the justice system

results.popUpText: You did not let your feelings control you and left Baddie to the justice system. You don't feel vengeful anymore. The police force gave you a bonus salary for your efforts in capturing Baddie.

choices.choice_text: Ask Agent Smith for an autograph

results.popUpText: He refused it as he believes that his signature is a highly classified item.

choices.choice_text: Ask Agent Smith for an autograph again

results.popUpText: Smith said that if you accept delivering a very important suitcase to a secret address, he would give you an autograph.
Smith gave you a suitcase and a note which has the address written on it. A few days later, a man called you and offered the pay you great money if you give him the address.
The mysterious man who offered money for the address was Smith and he did this to test your honesty. As you kept his secret, he gave you his autograph as a reward.
You found out the man who offered money was Smith himself. He tried to test your honesty and you failed! You will never get his autograph ever...

dilemmas.text: Which kind of toy car do you want?

choices.popUpText: You dreamt of your father while playing with it.
To make your games more realistic, you started a fire. Your mother extinguished the flames and got angry with you.
You ran around the house as you fly the race car in your hands.

dilemmas.text: One of your friends stole an eraser from a classmate.

choices.choice_text: Confront him to take back the eraser
choices.popUpText: You gave a beating to the poor kid, then you got detention.
The teacher ignored this petty conflict and you are called a 'snitch' by your classmates.

choices.choice_text: Tell your friend to grow a spine
choices.popUpText: It broke his heart and so he ended his friendship with you.

dilemmas.text: You find some free time after school.

choices.popUpText: You started to feel your biceps after a few days.
You enjoyed your time, even though you simply wasted it.

choices.choice_text: Read books on law and order
choices.popUpText: You learnt about the rights of police officers and suspects.

dilemmas.text: You saw a senior officer oppressing a suspect on the street.

choices.popUpText: The poor suspect was falsely arrested. But you have to think about your career.
The senior officer mocked you and later you got reprimanded. But you felt good standing for what is right.
The administration did nothing about it and you felt disillusioned.

dilemmas.text: Your partner John ate all of your donuts.

choices.popUpText: He really liked your attitude and bought some new donuts for you.

choices.choice_text: Tell him to buy you new donuts
choices.popUpText: He got angry with your tone and bought your least favorite donut flavor.
He was angry all day without his morning coffee and it also made your day terrible.

dilemmas.text: You heard some suspicious sounds coming from the attic.

choices.choice_text: Grab your pistol and check it out
choices.popUpText: A squirrel jumped behind you as you shot a few times in the air. Luckily no one was hurt, except your pride.
No answer came from the attic, but you kept hearing sounds. It made you very nervous all day.
You realized that whoever is there should be more scared of you then you are scared of them.

dilemmas.text: You are called to action in a city-wide protest.

choices.choice_text: Try to act softly towards the protesters
choices.popUpText: One of the protestors gave you a flower and you became famous on social media.
Protesters cried and ran around in pain. Your evil intentions felt satisfied.

choices.choice_text: Stay away from the action and just watch
choices.popUpText: You chatted with some other policemen and enjoyed a peaceful day while the police and the protesters clashed in the street.

dilemmas.text: You are chasing down a bank robber's car.

choices.choice_text: Speed up and try a pit manouvre
choices.popUpText: As you sped up, you lose control and smashed into the barriers. They got away and you were hurt.

choices.choice_text: Take a shortcut to cut in front of him
choices.popUpText: The robber's car hit you head on and you got concussion from the impact. At least you caught them.

choices.choice_text: Try to shoot at his tyres while driving
choices.popUpText: You could not control the car with one hand and hit the barriers. They got away.

dilemmas.text: A gang offered you some money to ignore their illegal cucumber trade.

choices.popUpText: A few days later you got a mail containing some delicious pickles.
You could not overcome their numbers and they gave you a serious beating. At least they spared your life.

choices.choice_text: Trick them into taking their money, but organize a police raid when they least expect it
choices.popUpText: It was a surprise for the gang members as all of them got arrested in mere minutes. You were highly praised for your great strategy.

dilemmas.text: You feel extremely tired after a long career of chasing criminals.

choices.choice_text: Time to retire and enjoy life a bit
choices.popUpText: You rented a townhouse and started a relaxing life.

choices.choice_text: Don't retire as you have still things to do
choices.popUpText: You wish you still had your youth, but there is no rest for the wicked.

choices.choice_text: Find a bright and young police officer to train as an apprentice
choices.popUpText: You found a young lady and became her mentor. You retired to find time for your new mentorship.

customChanges.popUpText: Your mother and step-dad try to ignore your questions regarding your dad. They don't want to upset you.
Seeing all those kids playing with their father makes you sad. But it also gives you willpower to work hard.
You believe that you must work hard on your physique to be a good police officer.
You worked hard to get into the police force and finally they accepted your application!
Investigate every lead to find out about your father's killers. Any crime could lead you to your father's killer.

choices.choice_text: Put your finger on a burning candle

results.popUpText: Your finger burnt a bit and hurt you, but you loved the sensation.

choices.choice_text: Try to jump scare other kids

results.popUpText: You made several kids cry with your genius jump scare tactics. Your parents were not satisfied.
For some reason, you enjoy those gruesome and horrific movies.

choices.choice_text: Tell your nightmares to the classmates

results.popUpText: They reported you to the teacher after you narrated your nightmare with 7 headed scorpions. Your parents were quite sad about your wicked imagination.

choices.choice_text: Go to the cultists' secret pub

results.popUpText: You did not find any chance of socializing, but those red hooded figures and a funny looking lonely sorcerer got your attention.
One of the red hooded guys told you that their Scarlet Cult is only open to the individuals with lots of evil deeds. You need to rise your evil karma points to be invited by them.
They acknowledged your evil deeds and accepted you into their ranks. You can wear that funny looking red hood now.

choices.choice_text: Meet with the funny looking sorcerer

results.popUpText: The weird sorcerer's name is Dumbodor and he is looking for a pupil. He can teach you the secrets of dark magic.
He is very happy to be your master as he feels a strong magical presence in you.
You learnt how to cast a dark bolt. You tried it on your cat and it turned into a crow. What a weird spell.
This one was a bit hard to cast and you also hurt yourself a bit. But now you can zap people with your fingers. For the next step, Dumbodor told you to eat some weird foods to get your body ready.

choices.choice_text: Eat a pickle with chocolate sauce

results.popUpText: Ewww! It made your stomach cry in pain for days!
Auggh! Things you endure to be a master sorceress!
After several weeks of training. You gained an immense power and learnt the secrets of Dark Magic. But when you try to cast a dark boom spell, you killed Dumbodor by mistake. Oops!

choices.choice_text: Put on a Dark Magic show at the cultists' pub

results.popUpText: You conjured dragons, casted dark lightnings and lighted up the whole place with purple and black flashes. The cultists were enchanted and showered you with money. Then you get a letter from a man named Don Sorcerio: 'I want you as my apprentice!'
You meet with a charismatic wizard in dark robes. He accepted you as his pupil. After a few weeks, he revealed the location of the witch which cursed you. Time to confront her!

You cornered her in her small hut in the forest. She told you that Don Sorcerio had actually cursed you to become a terrible monster after you born. But she lifted the curse. While doing so also put a curse on your life which limits it to 60 years. She asks for forgiveness.
She tried to warn you against Don Sorcerio again before you cast a terrible death magic on her. She was destroyed. You felt a great rage and anger.
After killing the witch, you couldn't help yourself from serving Don Sorcerio. You helped him do his evil deeds and he paid you lots of money in return.
The witch warned you not to attack him without preparation, but you did not listen as you were filled with vengeance. Sorcerio easily defeated you with his death magic, and you died...

You understood the witch's point and forgave her. In return, she shared the secret of defeating Don Sorcerio: Burn down the wooden statue, steal his necklace and drink lots of soda before fighting him.
You found the statue in a playground and burned it down. It was used to scare children away, and you saved the playground with this action.
He left the necklace in his car. You got into the car with a teleportation spell and stole it.
You have no idea why you need to drink lots of soda, but it made you extremely gassy and restless.

You got into a wizard duel and it was going bad for you. Then you burped with the force of thousand winds and it destroyed him. Now you understand the point of drinking lots of soda. His minions accepted your mastery and gave their wealth to you.
You found a little shiny stone. It was quite heavy!
You carried the stone away, but it gave you some damage. You didn't know why.

choices.choice_text: Send the stone to Gundolf for examination

results.popUpText: Gundolf said: "The stone is so heavy because a sorcerer called Fenris locked someone's soul in it. If you defeat Fenris you can free or possess the soul, it's up to you."
You've found lots of time to practice while traveling.
His castle seemed to contain a lot of mysteries, you found an invisibility cloak.
Fenris defeated you in a few moves. He was way more powerful than you can imagine. You had to flee from his island.

choices.choice_text: Attack to Fenris using invisibility cloak.

results.popUpText: You sneaked on Fenris while invisible and stabbed him. A genie came out of the stone after the his death. The genie's fate is in your hands now.
The genie was so grateful for saving her that she wanted to be your companion and fight by your side forever.
The stone isn't that heavy for you anymore. It makes you more powerful when you hold it, you're considering making a ring out of it.

dilemmas.text: You had a terrible nightmare with dark monsters.

choices.choice_text: Try to go back to sleep to see them again
choices.popUpText: The monsters got scared of you after seeing you again. It was a hilarious dream.
They rushed to the room and your mother slept with you. It was a very uncomfortable sleep.

choices.choice_text: Try to draw the monsters in your nightmare
choices.popUpText: Your father found the horrific drawings and banned you from watching cartoons. 'Ban my nightmares, if you can!' you said.

dilemmas.text: You found a mouse hiding in your bedroom.

choices.choice_text: Capture it to do some experiments
choices.popUpText: The mouse fought back and bit you. You had to let it escape.
You suddenly heard the mouse's voice inside your head saying, 'thank you, hooman.'

choices.choice_text: Yell like crazy and call your father for help
choices.popUpText: Your yell scared the mouse and it vanished to somewhere hidden. Your father thought that you imagine things and banned you from watching cartoons. 'I don't watch cartoons anyway!' you yelled again.

dilemmas.text: One of your classmates told everyone that he saw a ghost in the restroom.

choices.popUpText: You saw a green ghost crying in the restroom. You sat down and poured your hearts out to each other. It felt good.

choices.choice_text: Ask him what color was the ghost
choices.popUpText: Everyone mocked you for believing in the ghost story. It hurt your feelings.

choices.choice_text: Mock him for believing in ghosts
choices.popUpText: The boy cried and you enjoyed every last second of it.

dilemmas.text: You learnt that the witch which might have cursed you is living in a close neighborhood.

choices.popUpText: As soon as she saw you approaching, she got on her broomstick and flew away. 'I need one of these.' you thought to yourself.
Your time will come to confront her in future. You feel it!

choices.choice_text: Call the police and report her as a 'dangerous witch'
choices.popUpText: The dispatcher got angry with your 'prank' and ended the call.

dilemmas.text: A woman came and asked for a beauty potion.

choices.choice_text: Brew a potion with cheese and fungus
choices.popUpText: It gave her lots of acnes and she hated you for this.

choices.choice_text: Brew a potion with flowers and toothpaste
choices.popUpText: She got a new beautiful face. She rewarded you with lots of money.

choices.choice_text: Brew a potion with bugs and dust
choices.popUpText: The potion melted her brain and she died afterwards. The police could not trace it back to you.

dilemmas.text: You started hearing whispers in the night. They call you to the street.

choices.choice_text: Heed their call and go out
choices.popUpText: You saw some clown ghosts dancing in the street. You had a great party together.

choices.choice_text: Tell them to shut up and go to sleep
choices.popUpText: Before you fall into sleep, a ghost choked you and then gave you a beating. It really hurt!
They did not realize that your earbuds have noise cancelling and kept calling you all night in vain.

dilemmas.text: A man cut you off in the supermarket line.

choices.popUpText: The poor man got cursed and turned into a frog. He spent the rest of his life trying to kiss beautiful women.

choices.choice_text: Try to cast a humiliating spell on him
choices.popUpText: Your spell gave the man a tail. He ran away in shame.
You took deep breaths and calmed yourself down.

dilemmas.text: You feel a rage building inside you.

choices.popUpText: You erupted in flames and burned down your house. It will cost you dearly.
Your rage burned the yoga mat and you hurt yourself in the process.

choices.choice_text: Take a bubble bath with soothing aromas
choices.popUpText: You felt very relaxed. But the water was steaming hot with your rage.

dilemmas.text: You see a little child carrying her injured parrot.

choices.choice_text: Grab the parrot to use at your experiments
choices.popUpText: You turned the parrot into a crow and it started working for you as a spy.
The parrot turned healthy with your touch and the child was extremely happy.

choices.choice_text: Tell the child to let it go
choices.popUpText: The child called you 'an evil witch' and ran away.

dilemmas.text: Neighbors are making too much noise and prevent you from sleeping.

choices.choice_text: Try to put a curse on their WIFI
choices.popUpText: In desperation, they hacked into your WIFI and used up all your data while you sleep.

choices.choice_text: Try to put a curse on their water system
choices.popUpText: Their water pumps erupted. It spilled into your apartment as well and ruined everything.
They heard about your reputation as a witch and immediately stopped their party in great fear.

customChanges.popUpText: You started to have the ability to shake your toys from afar. Finally gaining powers!
Your classmates think that you are weird and keep you to yourself. You feel lonely and depressed.
One of your classmates introduced you to a secret cult. You immediately accepted the chance. You can rise among the cult by participating with the cultists.
You had a depressing vision which shows that your curse will kill you when you are 60 years old. You must fulfill your ambitions before that time!

choices.choice_text: Let an inmate teach you how to speak

results.popUpText: The inmate taught you how to curse. Thank you so much!

choices.choice_text: Hang out in the prison computer room

results.popUpText: You can't read yet, but you find computers interesting.
The prisoner had an argument with your mother because of that.

choices.choice_text: Steal candies from an inmate for your mom

results.popUpText: You nailed it the operation. Your mom enjoyed the candies throughly.
Something fishy was in that sandwich and it made you puke. Your mother was angry with the mess.
It doesn't taste like popsicles at all!

choices.choice_text: Try to play soccer with the prisoners

results.popUpText: You didn't know they were going to make you the 'ball.'
You witnessed a fight, and you learnt something by watching it.
You've nailed it without getting caught.
Your plan didn't work out and got caught.

choices.choice_text: Hang out in the computer lab at school
